event.title: years of the county, Detroit was once strongly considered

data.event: In the early years of the county, Detroit was once strongly considered to be the county seat because Abilene was considered to be "too wild" of a town to serve as a center of government.
A post office was opened in Detroit in 1866, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1961.
